devdoc.details: Contract which returns a constant value of 0 for the deposit and borrowing rates.*

getPoolUtilisation(uint256,uint256).details: _totalLoans total value of loans_totalDeposits total value of deposits*

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: UsdcVariableUtilisationRatesCalculatorFixedRate

getPoolUtilisation(uint256,uint256).notice: Returns the pool utilisation, which is a ratio between loans and deposits utilisation = value_of_loans / value_of_deposits

setSpread(uint256).notice: Sets the spread between deposit and borrow rate, number between 0 and 1e18
